name: im-fabric-ui-automation-tests
description: Fabric Identity Module Automation Tests using Node JS, WebdriverIO and Browserstack

scripts.single: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/single.conf.js
scripts.intranet: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/intranet.parallel.conf.js
scripts.smoke: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/smoke.conf.js
scripts.phantomjs: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/phantomjs.conf.js
scripts.parallel: npm install && npm run clean && node custom-parallel-launcher.js
scripts.tablet: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/tablet.parallel.conf.js
scripts.mobile: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/mobile.parallel.conf.js
scripts.browserstack-local: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/browserstack.local.conf.js
scripts.local: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/local.conf.js
scripts.multiple: npm install && npm run clean && wdio conf/multiple.conf.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-allure && npm run clean-reports && npm run clean-error-shots

author: Nihar
